    • Method Detail

      • canAfford

        public static boolean canAfford​(java.util.List<? extends Coin> debt,
                                Player owner)
        This methods returns true if the player has enough coin to afford the bill.
        Parameters:
        debt - Is the due coin
        owner - is the player who has to pay
        Returns:
        true if the player can afford the debt

      • canAfford

        public static boolean canAfford​(int debt,
                                Player owner)
        This methods returns true if the player has enough coin to afford the bill.
        Parameters:
        debt - is the amount of due coin of non specified colour
        owner - is the player who has to pay
        Returns:
        true if the player can afford the debt

      • collectCoins

        public static java.util.List<Coin> collectCoins​(java.util.List<? extends Coin> debt,
                                                Player owner,
                                                Interviewer payer)
        This methods let the player to choose what payment method to use
        Parameters:
        debt - is the amount of coin the player needs to pay
        owner - is the player who has to pay. He MUST have sufficient coins to cover his debt
        payer - is the interface who will be asked to choose how to manage owner's debt
        Returns:
        the selected Coin chosen to pay the debt

      • collectCoins

        public static java.util.List<Coin> collectCoins​(int debt,
                                                Player owner,
                                                Interviewer payer)
        This methods let the player to choose what payment method to use
        Parameters:
        debt - is the amount of coin of non specified colour the player needs to pay
        owner - is the player who has to pay. He MUST have sufficient coins to cover his debt
        payer - is the interface who will be asked to choose how to manage owner's debt
        Returns:
        the selected Coin chosen to pay the debt
